sourcesContent:
// Task.js import React from 'react'; import './Task.css' function Task({ task, setCurrentTask, setIsEditing, deleteTask, markTaskCompleted, setIsModalOpen, color }) { return (

{task.title}

{task.description}

{task.completed ? : }
); } export default Task;
